title._content: Centennial International Exhibition, Philadelphia Pennsylvania, 1876 - Exhibit Hall

description._content: TITLE Centennial International Exhibition, Philadelphia Pennsylvania, 1876 - Exhibit Hall CREATOR French, J.A., Keene NH (?) SUBJECT Exhibitions - PA - Philadelphia DESCRIPTION Stereograph, possibly taken by J.A.French of Keene NH, of the Centennial International Exhibition held in Philadelphia in 1876. PUBLISHER Keene Public Library and the Historical Society of Cheshire County DATE DIGITAL 20090720 DATE ORIGINAL 1876 RESOURCE TYPE stereographs FORMAT image/jpg RESOURCE IDENTIFIER HS092 RIGHTS MANAGMENT No known copyright restrictions.
